trans-unit.source: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Python | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Python | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get started with Azure Redis Cache using Python
trans-unit.target: Get started with Azure Redis Cache using Python

trans-unit.source: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Python
trans-unit.target: How to use Azure Redis Cache with Python

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to get started with Azure Redis Cache using Python.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to get started with Azure Redis Cache using Python.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Install [redis-py](https://github.com/andymccurdy/redis-py).
trans-unit.target: Install [redis-py](https://github.com/andymccurdy/redis-py).

trans-unit.source: Create a Redis cache on Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a Redis cache on Azure

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398536), click **New**, **Data + Storage**, and select **Redis Cache**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure preview portal](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=398536), click **New**, **Data + Storage**, and select **Redis Cache**.

trans-unit.source: Enter a DNS hostname.
trans-unit.target: Enter a DNS hostname.

trans-unit.source: It will have the form `<name>.redis.cache.windows.net`.
trans-unit.target: It will have the form `<name>.redis.cache.windows.net`.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: Once you create the cache, click on it in the preview portal to view the cache settings.
trans-unit.target: Once you create the cache, click on it in the preview portal to view the cache settings.

trans-unit.source: You will need:
trans-unit.target: You will need:

trans-unit.source: Hostname.
trans-unit.target: Hostname.

trans-unit.source: You entered this name when you created the cache.
trans-unit.target: You entered this name when you created the cache.

trans-unit.source: Port.
trans-unit.target: Port.

trans-unit.source: Click the link under **Ports** to view the ports.
trans-unit.target: Click the link under **Ports** to view the ports.

trans-unit.source: Use the SSL port.
trans-unit.target: Use the SSL port.

trans-unit.source: Access Key.
trans-unit.target: Access Key.

trans-unit.source: Click the link under **Keys** and copy the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Click the link under **Keys** and copy the primary key.

trans-unit.source: Add something to the cache and retrieve it
trans-unit.target: Add something to the cache and retrieve it

trans-unit.source: Replace *<name>* with your cache name and *<key>* with your access key.
trans-unit.target: Replace *<name>* with your cache name and *<key>* with your access key.
